attributes.action: Ban foundation tutors from promoting archaic and out of date ideas such as sketch books...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition for a ban to prevent art foundation tutors promoting archaic and out of date ideas such as sketch books, still life, A1 portfolios, life drawing, long winded essays and pottery, to any student applying for a graphic design degree in this country.
